actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points  the target takes no damage from this attack.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The cat has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Safe Landing
special_abilities.desc: The cat takes no falling damage from the first 10 feet that it falls.
